c74object.name: velkeyin
c74object.description: Makes the computer keyboard to a velocity sensitive MIDI keyboard.

objarg.name: sensitivity
objarg.digest: Sets the sensitivity of the keyboard
objarg.description: Sets the sensitivity of the keyboard. 0 uses the raw kaypress amplitude leves, positive number increase the sensitivity and negative numbers decrease it.

objarg.name: gain
objarg.description: A number to be mutiplied with the velocity, equivelent of multiplying a gain value with the keypress sound signal.

method.name: signal
method.digest: Signal containing the sound of the keypresses
method.description: Signal containing the sound of the keypresses.
